title: following provisions of the Land Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage by section 1(2) of the Land Development Agency Act 
2021 (No. 26 of 2021), this Order appoints the day on which certain provisions 
of that Act in respect of the establishment of the Land Development Agency 
come into operation.
